title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a local runner for large language models with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integrations.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, supporting sync/async APIs and streaming responses.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, providing LLM and chat model interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama with fluent API design and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple interface to Ollama’s REST API with ActiveModel-like syntax.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper adding interactive prompts, shell completions, and config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, GPU support, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app example consuming Ollama’s streaming API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling retrieval-augmented generation with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerables for streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a chat interface and REST endpoints backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing additional endpoints and middleware for Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generated structs and streaming support.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Ollama model files with validation and docs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bringing local LLM conversations to servers using Ollama backends.
